column1: Okay! Here is the answer!!Capgemini SE is a French multinational professional services and business consulting corporation headquartered in Paris, France.It provides IT services and is one of the world's largest IT consulting, outsourcing and professional services companies with over 200,000 employees in over 40 countries, of whom nearly 100,000 are in India.It was founded in 1967 by Serge Kampf in Grenoble, France.
